name: Bridal Style
description:
This is a Style which brings out a beautiful bridal aesthetic. Simply call Style-Bridal in your prompt and your female characters will be ready for their wedding day!

If you'd like the effect to come through stronger (some models need it), try bumping up the emphasis on Style-Bridal - or adding it into your prompt multiple times.

Please consider joining my Patreon! Advanced SD tutorials, settings explanations, adult-art, from a female content creator (me!) patreon.com/theally
